*Three bots emerged from the crashed ship, shaken but un-scathed. Their 
perception programing fuzzy and dissoriantated. Shadow Cat is the first to 
clear the fog from her head.*
" Whoa, we are lucky that we even got away from that wreck without a 
scratch! Hey, where's the little 'un?"

*While the two larger bots had been orginizing themselves and checking if 
they where hurt, the littler bot had wandered off, his new beast mode was 
new to him and he was still at the stage where his beast mode might make him 
dissoriented and confused.*
* Snow Tech and Shadow Cat began to search for the little tyke. They had 
already gotten all they needed from the ship before it crashed. All their 
hardware and equipment was stored in their back-packs. They began to do a 
grid search in their beast modes. When it failed to turn up their little 
companion, they switched to robot mode. Shadow Cat searched the air, while 
Snow Tech did a spark signature scan from his portable computer. just when 
they had begun to wonder if the kid didn't make it, a beep sounded from 
Snow's computer.*

" Shadow Cat, he's of to your left, about a hundred yards or so. he's up 
high so i guess he's in the trees. my quess he thinks he's his beast mode 
right now, so approach with cation, he might get spooked and flee."

*Shadow Cat nodded and pressed her com-link*

" Thanks for the warning bro, i'll do just that."

* She then landed and took on her beast mode, and began to "stalk" her 
littler passanger. She knew she couldn't smell him, Because he was in the 
trees, so she searched for him using her scaning program.
A few yards later, she saw his energy signature in one of the tropical trees 
of this region, hiding in the folige, cleaning himself. Using extreme 
cation, she climed the tree trunk, making no sound as went. When she reached 
the top, she slowly poked her head through the leaves, showing just the top 
of her jet-black head and bright green eyes, turned purple due to her spark 
energy location program. She turned it off and looked slowly around. The 
little one was busy cleaning his paws, unaware of her presence. She grinned, 
this was too easy. Just then the little one spotted her and growled, 
spreading two pearl white WINGS! Amazed, she was unable to stop the babe 
when it took off into the now dusk sky, soaring off towards the ship, 
leaving her baffaled.*

" Snow Tech, you moron!" She yelled into her intercom as she quickly 
transformed " You didn't tell me that he had WINGS!"

*Snow Tech, who was dozing, jumped as his sister yelled out at him. He 
quickly scanned for the spark again, and nbot finding it he replied:*

" I didn't know, i didn't see him when he emerged from the ship, i was 
dissorinteted, and so where you, how where we to know? I can't find him on 
the spark Sig, so you'll have to do it manually, k? Good luck Sis!"

* And with a supirior smirk, he sighned off*

* Shadow Cat growled, he was being a pain in the ass again, why did he have 
to do this when there was an emergancy? She started to fly up out of the 
canopy, searching both with her natural eyes and with her spark Sig. 
program. He was off to the right now, and going like a little bumble bee. 
She grinned, he was cute, but more trouble than he was worth.*
